name: Market Access Specialist
description:
Candidate for this position will be responsible for monitoring & analyzing external market environment

Responsibilities

· Analyze economic, healthcare financing, demographic & epidemiological trends and prepare analytical materials for market forecast
· Monitor Key changes in Reimbursement System (including Program of Government Guarantees, high-tech medical care lists, DRG tariffs and other)
· Collect and analyze information on budgets allocation, plans of medical procedures’ volumes distribution on federal, regional & hospital level
· Prepare database tools, communications, presentations & training materials for the team
· Lead media monitoring and prepare updates for the team
· Provide analytical Support for Market Access activities & projects

Requirements:

· Higher education (economic, data science, medical, pharmaceutical, legal)
· Strong analytical skills
· Ability to analyze large datasets
· Work experience in the field of healthcare and (or) medical business, consultancy
· Knowledge of the basics of the healthcare system in Russia and the basic legal regulation of healthcare is a plus
· Knowledge of the theoretical basics of health technology assessment analysis and modeling is a plus
· Knowledge of the fundamental principles of evidence-based medicine, epidemiology and medical statistics is a plus
· English (at least upper-intermediate)
· Very good skills and knowledge of the basic Microsoft Office
· Ability to learn wide volumes of new information

professional_roles.name: Менеджер по продажам, менеджер по работе с клиентами
